verbose_text: Furthermore, knockout of either MC3R and MC4R or NPY and AgRP produced significant attenuation of the orexigenic effects of peripheral ghrelin, while ablation of AgRP neurons completely eliminates the effects of ghrelin.
evidence: NPY and AgRP produced significant attenuation of the orexigenic effects of peripheral ghrelin                           , while ablation of AgRP neurons completely eliminates the effects of ghrelin
